title: Hardware wars
brief_description: A hilarious parody of the space epic “Star Wars” [306301 / 300668 (captioned)]in which special effects are made with household appliances,available in any hardware store. The film takes on high budget spectaculars and “Coming Attraction” trailers, with particular emphasis on the special effects syndrome.
